content.rendered:
I am a computer science researcher and software developer, having recently graduated with an M.Tech degree in Computer Science from IIT Kharagpur. Apart from academics, I help organisations in designing and developing in-house systems for web, cloud and native environments. I take an active interest in developing applications for well-established as well as upcoming platforms.

I like to travel and enjoy being part of diverse communities. Here I share my experiences as a technology enthusiast as well as a young adult who has recently joined the industry and look forward to rejoining after a short break to continue with academics. These are mainly in the form of blog posts.

To know more about me, visit the “About me” section or check out my resume on LinkedIn. Feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions or just to get in touch with me.


Highly skilled Coder and a very Fast Learner

I have studied and worked with Sourav in college and I can vouch for the fact that Sourav is a highly skilled Coder and is a very fast learner. We had also participated in Coding competitions together and he is a good team player.

Rajdip Sengupta
Student
IIM Ranchi

Calm and composed leader

Sourav is a very calm and composed leader. His knowledge and expertise reflects in the work that he does. I have always admired his dedication towards work and I am proud to have been a part of the same group as him.

Apoorv Mehta
Experienced Graduate Student
San Jose State University

One of the best coders; a very helping person

I have worked one year in TCS with Sourav. He is one of the best coders I have worked with. A very helping person who even goes to office in holidays in order to help others. He is a very good team man also.

Srijan Gupta
M.Tech
Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata

Very important contribution to the project

I wish you luck. You made some very important contribution to the project.

Arnab Ray
Tata Consultancy Services

Organized, friendly and knowledgeable

I have worked as a Teaching Assitant in the PDS Lab for one semester. In that time period, I have found him to be friendly and knowledgeable. Above all, he is very much organized about his work and the duties. It was a great experience working with him.

Ayan Mondal
TCS Fellow, Ph.D. Research Scholar, and Graduate Teaching Assistant
Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur

Great Work on the iteration

Great Work on the iteration. We like more orange! (Note: “orange” indicates closed requirements on a pie chart.)

Linnea Sundberg
SAS

Good analytical and problem solving skills

I have known Sourav from our stay at IIT Kharagpur. He is a computer geek who spend most of his 24 hours gazing computer screens . Along with his interest in technology, he have good analytical and problem solving skills. One thing I can say about this guy is that if you ever give him… Read more “Good analytical and problem solving skills”

Ajay Jaiswal
Researcher
Samsung R&D Institute - Bangalore

Innate team play skill

I have worked with Sourav in multiple college projects where he has shown time and again his technical bend of mind alongwith an innate team play skill. In a nutshell Sourav is a marvellous person to have in a team.

Dwaipayan Sarkar
SIBM Pune

Organised, responsible, excellent leadership qualities

I have worked as a teaching assistant in the PDS lab for one semester. In that time period I have found hin to be friendly, approachable and extremely knowledgeable. Above all, he is quite an organised and responsible about his work and duties and displays excellent leadership qualities. It was great working with him.

Ushasi Chaudhuri
MS Scholar
IIT Kharagpur

A smart worker, very dynamic, has a deep understanding

Sourav is innovative and technically very strong. We were in same batch at Gateforum, he was very prompt at responding to conceptual questions. He secured very good rank (within 200) in GATE2014 and GATE2015 back to back with least effort, a smart worker. Very dynamic, I have always noticed his keen interest in various modern… Read more “A smart worker, very dynamic, has a deep understanding”

Srijani Chatterjee
Associate Consultant
Capgemini

Bright. Enthusiastic. Knowledge hungry.

A very bright fellow. Enthusiastic and Knowledge hungry !

Avinash Verma
Javascript Developer with 4 years of experience in AngularJS

Go-to person for any technical queries

I’ve studied with Sourav in college and 1 word which describes him is “brilliant”. He is sharp and always eager to learn and try new things in the technical domain. He’s a good team-player and helps people around him. He was the go-to person of the batch for any technical queries. He also loves sharing… Read more “Go-to person for any technical queries”

Rahul Pal
Software Engineer II
Dell EMC

Team player with leadership qualities

sourav is an old friend, he is reliable and hardworking, he is a team player and also have leadership qualities.

Ria Dey
Solar Specialist
Solarcity

Genius

Sourav Ghosh is future Steve Jobs…it is very rare that we come across a genius who is so down to earth and in touch with his roots.
His humble nature makes it a pleasure to work with him.
He has the hawk’s eye for seeking perfection at all his tasks.
HE IS… Read more “Genius”

Sayani Das
Engineer

Good friend and colleague with a helping hand

He has very sharp programming skills not only knowledge..And an mind that can handle risks and issues with your quality analytical skills.
A very good friend and colleague with a helping hand.

Rumi Deb
Datastage Developer
Tata Consultancy Services

Person I turn to on for advice

Sourav Ghosh is a person I turn to on for advice as to how to harness the power of. Additionally, Sourav Ghosh has done a series of small favors for me in the process, showing his sincerity and generosity. On that basis, I want to highlight Sourav Ghosh for being there for me when I… Read more “Person I turn to on for advice”

Lalit Kumar

Honest and hardworking

We have studied together in the same school. In those two years of time I have known him as an honest and hardworking person with a lot of patience to understand and analyze complex situations having a balanced approach towards them.

Priyanka Ghosh
M.Sc. Applied Physics(Gold Medalist)
IIT(ISM) Dhanbad

Passionate and detail-oriented

I have known Sourav as my classmate during our school days. Apart from his charming personality and friendliness, he has good analytical and interpersonal skills. Having come across his work, I feel that he is really passionate about his work and is detail-oriented.
I’m sure he is an asset to any organisation he works… Read more “Passionate and detail-oriented”

Shawan Sarkar
Copy Editor
Daily News and Analysis (DNA), Dainik Bhaskar Group

Great innovator and responsible person

I have known Sourav Ghosh for a long time . He is excellent coder with great technological mind. He is a great innovator and responsible person.
I would love to work with him in future.

Priyatanu Dey
Software Engineer
Harman International

Qualities of a leader

Sourav is a good friend of mine. I have known him for more than two decades now, from the time we started our primary schooling. He is very soft spoken, reliable and helpful. He has good team spirit and qualities of a leader. He is always up to date with the latest technologies in the… Read more “Qualities of a leader”

Nirmallya Kundu
University of Texas at Dallas

Sourav was a valuable member

Sourav was a valuable member of the community. He is resourceful, responsible and always ready to help. We worked as coordinators in Microsoft Appfest 2013 together along with other fellow student partners to make the event a success.

Satwiki De
Software Developer

Sincere and dedicated person

Wishing Sourav ‘All the Best’ for his future endeavours. A very sincere and dedicated person he is. In this short span, his contribution towards our team was enormous. Thanks for all his support.

Annesha Roy
Tata Consultancy Services

Hardworking and sincere

Sourav is one of the hardworking and sincere developers I came across. He has good Technical knowledge. Also a great team player. Keep up the good work ! I m sure you will reach great heights ! Best of Luck for future !!

Mayank Agarwal
Senior Software Engineer
Persistent Systems

We received very good feedback

We received very good feedback about you from clients and offshore associates. It was nice hearing positive feedback on you in a short duration.

Maruthi Kumar Potti
Project Manager
Tata Consultancy Services

Sourav is an avid learner

Sourav is an avid learner and very detail-oriented when it comes to exploring new concepts. His gluttony to know the unknown has always helped him to surmount the toughest challenges. His dexterity, fecund creativity and assiduity towards his work are qualities that make him a winner and a precious resource for any team he works… Read more “Sourav is an avid learner”

Sumana Sil
Programmer Analyst
Cognizant Technology Solutions

Good at problem solving

Very hardworking and good at problem solving

Rohini Nag
Infosys

Technology enthusiast

Sourav is a technology enthusiast. He likes to work on big systems and is a person of dedication. He is also strong in programming. He also likes to be volunteer at technology events and spread the awareness regarding new technologies.

Deepak Punjabi
SDE
Tookitaki
